explains: n. 灵丹妙药；炼金药；长生不老药；酏剂

sentences.en: It's not the air, it's healing elixir!
sentences.cn: 这不是空气，它的治疗仙丹！

sentences.en: Yet it hardly constitutes the discovery of an aqueous elixir.
sentences.cn: 然它很难构成水万能药的发现。

sentences.en: All these are merely the bottles carrying his mysterious elixir.
sentences.cn: 所有这些不过是装灵丹妙药的玻璃瓶。
